name: GMTK: Globular Mobile Tank
description:
This is the GMTK, a brand new design of all-terrain tank. It can roll and shoot, and it's also completly soundproof. We prepared some testing rooms for you to get use to this ultimate weapon.

You'll be able to control it with a Keyboard or a Controller, and we suggest you try the testing rooms in this order : Tutorials, Puzzles and then you can try to get some high scores in Arcade to prove you're our best pilot.

Good luck.

Made in 48 hours* in Game Maker for the GMTK Jam.

*Full disclosure :
I started on the 14th at 9am and put his on hold at 1am on the 15th. I then made a game for the GM48 on the 15th and 16th (you can play it here).
I only finished this game today (july 17th) from around midnight to 6:30am. (GMT+2)
So, I know it's not technically made in 48h from start to finish, but I didn't touch this during the GM48, so I hope it's okay.
(plus it's at around 16 hours of dev total)
